Title: To go on a thousand 'li' march to temper a red heart
Designer: Shanghai No. 3 glass household utensil factory revolutionary committee political propaganda group (上海玻璃器皿三厂)Xuhui district residential building and repair company No. 3 construction brigade revolutionary committee political propaganda group (徐汇区房屋修建公司第三工程队革委会政宣组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: A group of Mao supporters marches to Beijing to pledge allegiance to Mao. The painting of the young Mao is carried in front, like a traditional icon in a religious procession. The woman on the left in the front row is a barefoot doctor.
Theme: Revolutionary Networking (1966-1967)Chairman Mao goes to Anyuan
